name: ServiceChannel
description: A means for accessing a service, e.g. a government office location, web site, or phone number.
title: ServiceChannel

fields.name: providesService
fields.title: providesService
fields.description: The service provided by this channel.

fields.name: serviceLocation
fields.title: serviceLocation
fields.description: The location (e.g. civic structure, local business, etc.) where a person can go to access the service.

fields.name: servicePostalAddress
fields.title: servicePostalAddress
fields.description: The address for accessing the service by mail.

fields.name: availableLanguage
fields.title: availableLanguage
fields.description: A language someone may use with or at the item, service or place. Please use one of the language codes from the IETF BCP 47 standard. See also inLanguage

fields.name: serviceSmsNumber
fields.title: serviceSmsNumber
fields.description: The number to access the service by text message.

fields.name: serviceUrl
fields.title: serviceUrl
fields.description: The website to access the service.

fields.name: servicePhone
fields.title: servicePhone
fields.description: The phone number to use to access the service.

fields.name: processingTime
fields.title: processingTime
fields.description: Estimated processing time for the service using this channel.
